item.title: Report
item.description: I’m really happy to have seven month research stay at ABB Corporate Research Center in Västerås, Sweden. ABB colleagues are nice and friendly. I wish to have more contact with them both for work and spare time.

item.title: Course
item.description: I was really happy to be one of the team member. The knowledge of permanent magnet is useful for the motor designer.

item.title: Journal Paper
item.description: I would appreciate all the co-authers for their contribution in the paper entitled “The Scalable Analytical Model for Calculating the Magnetic Field of Surface Mounted Permanent Magnet Motor”. This paper entitled was submitted to IEEE Transactions on Industrial Electronics on 21-Apr-2023， revised on 09-Aug-2023 and 15-Nov-2023, accepted on 31-Jan-2024.

item.title: Experiment
item.description: I’m really happy to learn from it! Happy New Year!

item.title: Journal Paper
item.description: I would appreciate all the co-authers for their contribution in the paper entitled “Hybrid Analytical Model of Permanent Magnet Linear Motor Considering Iron Saturation and End Effect”
